api/eDIA.html.title: Namespace eDIA | Edia Testproject documentation
api/eDIA.html.keywords: Namespace eDIA Classes eParam Parameter package definition to send along with an event. EventManager EventManager handles eventlisteners and fire events when triggered. It uses eparam class to be able to send custom packages along with the event. ExperimentManager Core manager of the experiment. Singleton so available throughout the system. ExperimentManager.ExperimentConfig Main container to store sessions config, either from disk, editor or network ExperimentManager.SettingsTuple Tuple of strings. Serializable in the inspector and dictionaries are not ExperimentManager.TrialSequenceValues Stringlist with trial setting values ExperimentManager.TrialSequenceValuesContainer Container for (de)serializing a list to JSON FileManager Static class to handle file IO InputActionHandler Mapping new Input system InputAction to eDIA EventManager MainMenu Main menu can be opened in the app with the action 'Menu' It generates a list of scenes (which are tasks) and the default 'continue' and 'quit' option MainMenu.aScene A scene menuitem container NetworkComManager Communication manager interface. Translates internal commands into network packages and viseversa NetworkManager Manages network connections, disconnections, auto connect, etc ScreenFader Handles fading the camera view SystemManager The SystemManager is a Singleton and therefor reachable from whatever script. The script travels along the scenes that are loaded as it is DontDestroyOnLoad. Responsible for loading/unloading, user related actions, top level application stuff. Has references to the XR rig camera and hands for the rest of the application. TaskManagerBase Link between ExperimentManager and the custom user task. Hidden base where the custom task template is build upon. TaskManagerBase.TaskSettingsContainer Each task has it's own settings. Container to deserialize the TaskSettings.json file in TaskManagerBase.TrialStep A task trial exists out of one of more steps XRrigInitialiser XRrigUtilities

api/eDIA.SystemManager.html.keywords: Class SystemManager The SystemManager is a Singleton and therefor reachable from whatever script. Has references to the XR rig camera and hands for the rest of the application. api/TASK.html.title: Namespace TASK | Edia Testproject documentation
api/TASK.html.keywords: Namespace TASK Classes TaskManagerDemo This is a DEMO script for a very simple task. All main functionalities to run the Experiment, UXF and Trial statemachine are in TaskManagerBase so no need to worry about that. To start your own TaskManager for your experiment task: Copy/Paste the complete 'DemoTask' folder from /eDIA/Samples to the /Assets/ folder in your project Rename the script file and class to your Taskname Switch the inspector to 'debug' mode (3 dots right topcorner) Find [ SYSTEM ] > [ EXP ] gameobject and replace 'TaskManagerDemo' script entry in the inspector with your TaskManager script and switch inspector mode back again TaskManagerTemplate This is a DEMO script for a very simple task. All main functionalities to run the Experiment, UXF and Trial statemachine are in TaskManagerBase so no need to worry about that. To start your own TaskManager for your experiment task: Copy/Paste the complete 'DemoTask' folder from /eDIA/Samples to the /Assets/ folder in your project Rename the script file and class to your Taskname Switch the inspector to 'debug' mode (3 dots right topcorner) Find [ SYSTEM ] > [ EXP ] gameobject and replace 'TaskManagerDemo' script entry in the inspector with your TaskManager script and switch inspector mode back again UserMessageHandler Sample script to show the user a message in VR canvas
